ls.s: Are you sure you want to remove this share, all its contents and clear all user access?
Are you sure you wish to remove %%ITEM%% from the share?
Are you sure you wish to remove %%FOLDER%% and all the items inside from the share?
Are you sure you wish to remove these %%COUNT%% items and the items inside any folders from the share?
Are you sure you wish to remove these %%COUNT%% items from the share?
